kw.name: Open Browser to Landing Page
kw.doc: A general startup keyword for opening a browser to the landing page.

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: Wait Until Network Is Idle
kw.doc: Waits until there has been at least one instance of 500 ms of no network traffic on the page after loading.
